text: Martina Navratilova (; born Martina Subertov√° on October 18, 1956, in Prague, Czechoslovakia) is a Czech-American retired tennis player who has been World No. 1. Navratilova is openly lesbian.Martina Navratilova sued by lesbian lover She married Julia Lemigova in December 2014. In February 2010, she was diagnosed with breast cancer. The following month she had surgery to remove it.Martina Navratilova diagnosed with breast cancer ==References== Category:1956 births Category:American autobiographers Category:American tennis players Category:American LGBT people Category:American LGBT rights activists Category:Australian Open champions Category:Tennis coaches Category:Czech tennis players Category:French Open champions Category:Lesbians Category:Living people Category:LGBT sportspeople Category:Naturalized citizens of the United States Category:Participants in American reality television series Category:Sportspeople from Prague Category:US Open (tennis) champions Category:Wimbledon champions Category:World No. 1 tennis players Category:BBC 100 Women
title: Martina Navratilova
